result.execSummary:
The defendant Jamie Lee Morkwed was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Vehicle Operator Flee/Elude Officer, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

AMENDED 04-25-2017:  Defendant to serve 20 days in the Pepin County Jail commencing 6-15-2017 unless by that date all court ordered obligations are paid in full as verified by the Department of Corrections.

records.addlTxt:
Discharge Certificate.   Effective July 7, 2017, discharged from judgment only.
Civil rights restored:  1)Right to Vote.  2)Obligations for jury duty.
Civil rights not restored:  1)Firearms may not be used or possessed unless a pardon, which does not restrict possession of firearms, is received from the governer.  2)Public office can not be held unless a pardon is obtained from the governor.
Payment from DOC
Correspondence from DOC that defendant paid DOC today $518.

Defendant Jamie Lee Morkwed in court.  Probation Review Hearing set by court as defendant nearing discharge with nothing paid towards court ordered obligations.  Court orders defendant serve 20 days in the Pepin County Jail com. 6/15/17 at 6:00 p.m. unless by that date all court ordered obligations of $518.00 have been paid to the DOC.

Probation review hearing on April 25, 2017 at 10:45 am.

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Associated with Charge #1

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: Defendant Jamie Lee Morkwed in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel informs court of plea agreement.   Court advises defendant of charge/max. penalties and felony prohibitions.  Defendant pleads no contest.  Court reviews PLQ/WOR form. Defendant is a citizen of the US.  Counsel agree facts support the charge. Court finds defendant's waiver of his constitutional rights & plea done knowingly & voluntarily.  Advised of felony prohibitions.  Court accepts plea and finds defendant guilty.  Defendant currently on probation in ND.  Court withholds sentence and places defendant on 2 yrs. probation with conditions:  120 days in PCJ imposed & stayed on condition of no probation violations; 6 mos. revocation of license; provide a DNA sample; pay court costs/surcharges $518 according to a schedule as set by P&P.  Advised of appeal rights.

Signature Bond Set

Defendant Jamie Lee Morkwed in court with attorney Patrick W. Waters.  Defendant Jamie Lee Morkwed in custody.   Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Waters requests Signature Bond.  State objects, $2500 cash bond appropriate.  Court converts bond to $2500 Sign. Bond with conditions:  no possession or consumption of alcohol; no entrance into bars or taverns; no other violations of law; no driving without a valid license or insurance.  Defendant waives time limits for P.H.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 4, 2014 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Jamie Lee Morkwed in court, in custody.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Judge advises defendant of charge/max. penalties and rights including the right to a preliminary hearing within 10 days if in custody, 20 days if not.  State requests $5000 cash bond.  Court sets $2500 cash bond.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 7, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
